reference.title: Libraries provided by Derby
reference.shortdesc: This section shows the different libraries used by and their purposes.

section.p: The following table shows the engine library.

table.title: Engine library
table.desc: This table lists the engine library and describes its uses.

row.entry: Library Name
Use

For embedded databases.
You always need this library for embedded environments. For client/server environments, you only need this library on the server.

section.p: For embedded environments, you need a library in the classpath to use a tool. For a client/server environment, you need a library on the client only. The following table shows the tools libraries.

table.title: Tools libraries
table.desc: This table lists the tools libraries and describes their uses.

row.entry: Library Name
Use
Required for running all the tools (such as ij, dblook, and import/export).
Executable jar file that can be used to start the tools.

section.p: The following table shows the Network Server library.

table.title: Network Server library
table.desc: This table lists the Network Server library and describes its uses.

row.entry: Library Name
Use
Required to start the Network Server.

section.p: The following table shows the network client library.

table.title: Network client library
table.desc: This table lists the network client library and describes its uses.

row.entry: Library Name
Use
Required to use the network client driver.

section.p: The following table shows the locale libraries.

table.title: Locale libraries
table.desc: This table lists the locale libraries and describes their uses.

row.entry: Library Name
Use
Required to provide translated messages for the Czech locale.
Required to provide translated messages for the German locale.
Required to provide translated messages for the Spanish locale.
Required to provide translated messages for the French locale.
Required to provide translated messages for the Hungarian locale.
Required to provide translated messages for the Italian locale.
Required to provide translated messages for the Japanese locale.
Required to provide translated messages for the Korean locale.
Required to provide translated messages for the Polish locale.
Required to provide translated messages for the Brazilian Portuguese locale.
Required to provide translated messages for the Russian locale.
Required to provide translated messages for the Simplified Chinese locale.
Required to provide translated messages for the Traditional Chinese locale.
